reviewText: Best way to learn the body.
Impressed by the superficial and deep fascia. Not what I had imagined.

Excellent teacher. This is a much needed disction of the human body to clarify what's going on. Very interesting watch for doctors, anatomist and especially manual therapist.

Gil is a gifted and sensitive teacher, you will love the series.
This DVD give me a better understanding with it comes to the body in relation to the fascia. thank you so much.

Im a Massage therapist have done dissection for a number of years. Never has the superficial fascia been explained nor view in the way Gil has in this DVD. It is an inspiration, and keeps you in awe of the human body.
